subject: fix: hide PWA install button in standalone mode and fix mobile button wrapping
body:
The install button could appear when the app was already running as an installed
PWA because the standalone detection only updated status text without hiding the
button or guarding the beforeinstallprompt handler. Header buttons also
overflowed on mobile due to missing flex-wrap.

- Add isStandalone flag to guard beforeinstallprompt handler
- Call hidePWAInstallButton() and hide PWA settings section in standalone mode
- Add flex-wrap to export-buttons container for mobile wrapping
